mods.abstract: First English translation of the complete text of the Quran
mods.note: The French source "L’Alcoran de Mahomet" was first published by Antoine de Sommaville in Paris 1647. The translation is accompanied by "The life and death of Mahomet, the prophet of the Turks, and author of the Alcoran". Ross added "A needfull caveat or admonition, for them who desire to know what use may be made of, or if there be danger in reading the Alcoran"
Images from one of three copies in Burke Library.
